StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [DeleteTakeOneCard]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@cardID uniqueiden..er
AS BEGIN -- Need to delete records in the following order: -- TakeOneLoca.onRestock, TakeOneLoca.on, TakeOneCard
SELECT [ID] ,[TakeOneCardID] INTO #TakeOneLoca.on_Temp FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[TakeOneLoca.on] WHERE [TakeOneCardID] = @cardID
DELETE FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[TakeOneLoca.onRestock] WHERE [TakeOneLoca.onRestock].[TakeOneLoca.onID] IN (SELECT #TakeOneLoca.on_Temp.[ID] FROM #TakeOneLoca.on_Temp)
DELETE FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[TakeOneLoca.on] WHERE [TakeOneCardID] = @cardID
DELETE FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[TakeOneCard] WHERE [ID] = @cardID
DROP TABLE #TakeOneLoca.on_Temp
END
